Text: How can it be complete if it omits Empire of the Sun. Possibly his best book?
That's a very reasonable complaint. If I were you, I'd demand a refund.
See an update with 'Empire' and an active ToC to the Complete Stories here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6808478/Complete_Works_of_J.G._Ballard_for_Kindle_%28update_11-10-2011%29
